thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 24 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Ningbo Tuopu Group sees FY 2017 net profit up 22 pct to 28 pct

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Ningbo Tuopu Group sees FY 2017 net profit up 22 pct to 28 pct

organizations.name: reuters) - ningbo tuopu group co ltd

text:
Jan 24(Reuters) - Ningbo Tuopu Group Co Ltd :
* Sees FY 2017 net profit to increase by 22 percent to 28 percent, or to increase by 134.3 million yuan to 174.3 million yuan
* Says FY 2016 net profit was 615.7 million yuan
* The reasons for the forecast are improved performance of main business and contribution from investment return and government subsidy Source text in Chinese: goo.gl/FoUP7Y Further company coverage: (Beijing Headline News)
